# Code Chunk

to add code, make a chunk by clicking (Insert and then R)
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
# install.packages("RColorBrewer")
library(RColorBrewer)
```

or by using shortcuts, on mac (cmd +alt + i) and on pc (ctrl + alt + i)
